seller_description: These casual slippers are made from durable tape/synthetic material and feature a convenient slip-on closure for easy wear. Manufactured and packed by Relaxo Footwears Limited, headquartered in New Delhi, they are lightweight at just 283 g and have dimensions of 28 x 13 x 10.5 cm. Sold as a single unit (Net Quantity: 1 count), they are versatile and suitable for everyday use as flip-flops or house slippers. Combining style, comfort, and functionality, these slippers are a reliable choice for relaxed wear.
review: Exchange pack was good. Good to wear
